about_the_game: This DLC Is for being able to use the atv. If you do not have this dlc installed you will not be able to use the ATV. All you can do is look at it.  The 4-wheeler ATV is used in most maps in the game. These maps are Compound, Compound2, Forest, HillSide, Outdoor, GhostTown, GT_Spools, TheTubesC, and Warehouse. The colors on the vehicle will be as follows. Red is red team, blue is blue team and black is no team. anyone can use any ATV and the skin will be the proper color depending on team your on. All atvs have a full auto paintball gun turret attached to them with plenty of ammo to use :).  Enjoy!
detailed_description: This DLC Is for being able to use the atv. If you do not have this dlc installed you will not be able to use the ATV. All you can do is look at it.  The 4-wheeler ATV is used in most maps in the game. These maps are Compound, Compound2, Forest, HillSide, Outdoor, GhostTown, GT_Spools, TheTubesC, and Warehouse. The colors on the vehicle will be as follows. Red is red team, blue is blue team and black is no team. anyone can use any ATV and the skin will be the proper color depending on team your on. All atvs have a full auto paintball gun turret attached to them with plenty of ammo to use :).  Enjoy!
name: Full-On Paintball - ATV Vehicle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit only)
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A graphics card with shader model 3.0 support.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 8000 series or higher graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
